shared.model.bank

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.bank.Bank
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerBank

    public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    isaachartung The Bank Object holds ResourceCard Objects and DevelopmentCard Objects. It contains methods to add and remove these objects, as well as to query information concerning them. It also contains two boolean data members: one which tells us whether this bank holds the largestArmyCard and another which indicates whether this bank has the longestRoadCard. These also have setters and methods to query their value.

      • addRC

        public void addRC(ResourceCard RC)
        adds a single resource card to the bank.
        Parameters:
        RC - is a ResourceCard object
        Precondition:
        RC is not null
        Postcondition:
        RC is added to the Bank's Array

      • addDC

        public void addDC(DevelopmentCard DC)
        adds a single development card to the bank.
        Parameters:
        DC - is a DevelopmentCard Object
        Precondition:
        DC is not null
        Postcondition:
        DC is added to the Bank's Array of DC Cards

      • getRC

        public ResourceCard getRC(ResourceType rt)
        returns a resource card of the type specified by the parameter. if not found, it returns null
        Parameters:
        rt - is a ResouceType
        Precondition:
        rt is a valid ResourceType, namely Grain, Ore, etc.
        Postcondition:
        a ResourceCard Object of the parameter type is returned, null if the bank has none.

      • getDC

        public DevelopmentCard getDC(DevCardType dt)
        returns a Development card of the type specified by the parameter. if not found, it returns null
        Parameters:
        dt - is a DevCardType
        Precondition:
        dt is valid DevCardType, namely Soldier, Monopoly, etc.
        Postcondition:
        a DevelopmentCard Object of the parameter type is returned, null if the bank has none.

      • hasRC

        public boolean hasRC(ResourceType rt,
            int quantity)
        returns true if the player possesses the given quantity of the specified resource card.
        Parameters:
        rt - is a ResourceType
        quantity - is the number of cards we want to find
        Precondition:
        a valid ResourceType is given and a non-negative quantity
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player has the specified number of the specified type, false otherwise.

      • hasDC

        public boolean hasDC(DevCardType dt,
            int quantity)
        returns true if the player possesses the given quantity of the specified development card.
        Parameters:
        dt - is a DevCardType
        quantity - is the number of cards we want to find
        Precondition:
        a valid DevCardType and a non-negative quantity
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player has the specified number of the specified type, false otherwise.
